alert.note: Alert for Boone; Story (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Tornado Warning issued October 13 at 3:25PM CDT until October 13 at 4:15PM CDT by NWS DesMoines
info.description: The National Weather Service in Des Moines has issued a * Tornado Warning for... Northwestern Story County in central Iowa... Northeastern Boone County in central Iowa... * Until 415 PM CDT. * At 324 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm capable of producing a tornado was located over Ames, moving north at 15 mph. HAZARD...Tornado. SOURCE...Radar indicated rotation. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. * This dangerous storm will be near... Ames and Gilbert around 330 PM CDT. Story City around 350 PM CDT. TORNADO...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN
info.instruction: TAKE COVER NOW! Move to a basement or an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris.
